title: Mike Birbiglia | Trump Ramps Up the Racism Because He’s Failed at Everything Else: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump and his allies on Fox News doubling down on racism as the strategy for his re-election.

Then, he talks to comedian Mike Birbiglia.
